title: Mud Balls!
description: In Mud Balls!, two children take the reader through the steps to create mud balls. This informational book uses a familiar subject to make functional writing interesting for students. The text also affords opportunities to teach about author's purpose, capitalization, and other reading skills.
meta: dry, mix, mud, sand, scoop, shape
Make, revise, and confirm predictions to understand text
Initial and Final Sounds : Discriminate initial and final consonant /s/ sound
Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Ss
Concept Words : Recognize and use position words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
